responsible.translation[0].definitions[0: if someone is responsible for an accident, mistake, crime etc, it is their fault or they can be blamed
If anything goes wrong, I will hold you personally responsible.
We are determined to bring the people responsible to justice.
Police believe that the same man is responsible for three other murders in the area.
responsible.translation[0].definitions[1: having a duty to be in charge of or to look after someone or something
Mills is responsible for a budget of over $5 million.
The airline is legally responsible for the safety of its passengers.
He is responsible for recruiting and training new staff.
responsible.translation[0].definitions[2: if something is responsible for a change, problem, event etc, it causes it
The floods were responsible for over a hundred deaths.
responsible.translation[0].definitions[3: sensible and able to make good judgments, so that you can be trusted
You can leave the children with Billy – he’s very responsible.
It’s time you started acting like a responsible adult.
responsible.translation[0].note_box[0].i: Responsible is always an adjective, never a noun
The person/man/woman etc responsible is the person who has done something, usually something bad
We will catch the person responsible
We will catch the responsible person
You say that someone is responsible for something
Who is responsible for this mess?
responsible.translation[1].definitions[0: to be officially in charge of something as part of your job, meaning you must accept the blame if something goes wrong
Partners are officially responsible for all the firm’s financial obligations.
the City watchdog responsible for regulating fund managers
responsible.translation[1].definitions[1: if you are responsible to someone in your job, you have to report your actions, progress etc to them
The Computer Group Manager is responsible to the Head of Computer Development.
responsible.translation[1].definitions[2: a job, position etc in which the ability to make good judgements and decisions is important
As works manager, I had an interesting and responsible job.
